title: Tejarah Talks discusses Oman's journey to Net-Zero target - Times Of Oman

title_detail.value: Tejarah Talks discusses Oman's journey to Net-Zero target - Times Of Oman
summary_detail.value: Tejarah Talks discusses Oman's journey to Net-Zero target  Times Of Oman
source.title: Times Of Oman
text: Muscat: As Oman progresses towards its 2050 Net-Zero target, Tejarah Talks takes a deep dive into what exactly the green transition means for Omani companies and investigates the new commercial opportunities it is opening up for local businesses. Generously sponsored by Jindal Shadeed; Sustainable City - Yiti; Nortal; Omantel; and OmanFM, Tejarah Talks is an Oman Business Forum initiative organised in association with the Ministry of Commerce Industry and Investment Promotion (MoCIIP). The next edition of this popular discussion forum “Oman’s Journey to Net-Zero: An Environment for Enterprise?” is scheduled for Wednesday 17 May at 7:30pm and will be held at Omantel’s Head Office in Airports Heights. Noting that the session will provide a platform for Omani businesses of all sizes to learn more about the latest developments in sustainable practices and climate-related regulations, Maymuna Al Adawi, MoCIIP Director, Public Private Partnerships and organizer of Tejarah Talks said: “Given that SMEs make up 90% of all businesses, employ 70% of the world’s workforce and contribute over 50% of global GDP, their role in achieving climate goals is key. Our SMEs here in Oman are no exception. They have a huge role to play in the collective corporate effort to address climate change and achieve Net-Zero emissions by 2050. With this Tejarah Talks, we aim not only to inform but also to inspire and empower local SMEs to take meaningful climate action and seize the opportunities this presents.” Al Adawi went on to explain: “The green transition will fundamentally transform every part of Oman’s economy. Some of these changes will be visible, such as renewable energy and electric vehicles, but most will happen behind the scenes in the way organisations operate and manage their relationships. In fact, Oman’s journey towards Net-Zero presents a raft of opportunities for local SMEs to reduce running costs, develop new products, create jobs, attract investment and new customers – ultimately helping them maintain a competitive advantage locally and globally. Indeed, we believe sustainable development and economic growth can go hand in hand. We encourage business owners to attend this Tejarah Talks session as we make our way towards a greener future.” Internationally recognized as a country with major potential in the green economy, Oman is already home to several large renewable energy initiatives, including the US$400 million 500MW Ibri greenfield solar power project and the 30GWh Dhofar Wind Power Plant – the GCC’s first-large-scale wind farm - which are helping reduce reliance on fossil fuels and transition towards cleaner energy sources. Additionally, Oman’s efforts to develop green hydrogen and carbon capture and storage technologies demonstrate its firm commitment to reducing greenhouse gas emissions while supporting economic growth. Tejarah Talks “Oman’s Journey to Net-Zero: An Environment for Enterprise?” will be moderated by His Highness Sayyid Dr. Adham Al Said, Co-founder, The Firm. Sharing expertise and insights will be panellists Fadi Al Shihabi, KPMG Partner & ESG Services Lead; Dimitra Theodoropulos, Talabat Director, Sustainability; and Hilal Al Ghaithi, Director, Energy, Authority for Public Services Regulation.

title: Top 10 Best Agricultural Chemicals Companies In India In 2023 - Inventiva
published_parsed: time.struct_time(tm_year=2023, tm_mon=5, tm_mday=3, tm_hour=7, tm_min=0, tm_sec=0, tm_wday=2, tm_yday=123, tm_isdst=0)
summary: Top 10 Best Agricultural Chemicals Companies In India In 2023  Inventiva
title_detail.value: Top 10 Best Agricultural Chemicals Companies In India In 2023 - Inventiva
summary_detail.value: Top 10 Best Agricultural Chemicals Companies In India In 2023  Inventiva
source.title: Inventiva
text: INTRODUCTION In 2023, India is one of the leading agricultural chemical companies in the world. The demand for agricultural chemicals has seen a constant rise over the years as new products are constantly being introduced and enhanced to meet the needs of farmers. Companies such as UPL, PI Industries, Nectar Lifesciences, Rallis India, and Coromandel International are some of the leading agricultural chemical companies in India. Each of these companies specializes in different fields of agriculture chemicals, ranging from crop protection solutions, fertilizers, bio-pesticides, and biocontrols. UPL is an agrochemical company that has a wide range of products, including insecticides, fungicides, herbicides and seed treatment solutions. It is the second-largest producer of glyphosate in India. PI Industries is a research-oriented agrochemical manufacturer that offers customized solutions for crop protection. Nectar Lifesciences produces formulations for crop protection, health care, nutrition, and animal health. Rallis India is one of the leading manufacturers of crop protection solutions in India. It has more than 30 crop protection chemicals and formulations with approximately 100 active ingredients. Coromandel International is another leading agrochemical company in India and is involved in the manufacturing of agrochemicals, fertilizers, seeds, and other agricultural inputs. These companies have been instrumental in helping Indian farmers improve their yields and increase their profitability by providing them with quality products at competitive prices. These companies are also contributing significantly to the growth of the agricultural sector in India. IMPORTANCE Agricultural chemicals companies in India are of great importance in 2023. With the growing population, the demand for food is increasing exponentially and this has caused farmers to rely more on agricultural chemicals to maximize crop yields. The use of fertilizers, herbicides, insecticides, fungicides and other agricultural chemicals not only help increase productivity but also make sure that the crop quality is high. In addition to this, these agricultural chemicals also help prevent pests, diseases and weeds from attacking crops, thus ensuring higher farm profits. Moreover, they help farmers save time and money by eliminating manual labor and ensuring the health of their crops. Many agricultural chemicals companies in India are working hard to provide a range of products to meet the needs of farmers. The Indian government is also supporting these companies by providing subsidies and other incentives to farmers. These measures have made it easier for farmers to access these agricultural chemicals, allowing them to maximize their profits. Furthermore, the government is focusing on developing new technologies that can help improve output and reduce costs, which is beneficial for both the farmers and the companies. Overall, agricultural chemicals companies in India are playing an important role in meeting the country’s growing food demand in 2023. They are helping farmers increase crop yields and improve crop quality while also reducing costs and improving efficiency. With the help of the government and the industry’s commitment to innovation, the agriculture sector in India is sure to continue to grow and prosper. Here are the top 10 best agricultural chemicals companies in India in 2023 Bayer Crop Science – Bayer Crop Science is a division of Bayer AG, one of the world’s leading life science companies. Bayer Crop Science develops innovative solutions for sustainable agricultural production and improved food security. Their products include crop protection products, seed treatments, biotechnology traits, digital agriculture solutions, and other services that help farmers manage their crops and make informed decisions. The company focuses on research and development in order to provide farmers with product innovations that can improve yields, prevent crop losses, and increase sustainability. Bayer Crop Science works closely with farmers, providing them with reliable services and advice. They also collaborate with public institutions and non-governmental organizations (NGOs) to support sustainable agriculture. Bayer Crop Science invests heavily in R&D, spending more than €2 billion each year on developing new products and technologies. Their portfolio includes insecticides, herbicides, fungicides, and agrochemical solutions that can protect crops from diseases and pests. They also develop seeds that are resistant to climate change, soil-borne diseases, and extreme weather conditions. Bayer Crop Science is committed to improving agricultural productivity and environmental protection through responsible use of resources and sustainable practices. As part of their commitment to sustainability, they are working to reduce greenhouse gas emissions by improving energy efficiency, reducing waste, and using renewable energy sources. Additionally, they have launched several initiatives to support smallholder farmers, including training and providing financial assistance. In conclusion, Bayer Crop Science is a leader in the field of agricultural technology and sustainable farming. They offer farmers innovative products and services to enable them to produce higher-quality crops more efficiently and sustainably. DuPont – Dupont is a global science-based materials and specialty products company founded in 1802. It has operations in more than 70 countries across the world and employs over 90,000 people. Dupont’s core business consists of agriculture and nutrition, advanced materials, coatings, industrial biosciences, performance chemicals, safety and protection and water purification. The company also manufactures products for electronics, automotive, construction, energy and healthcare markets. Dupont’s Agriculture and Nutrition segment focuses on crop protection, seed technologies, animal nutrition, human nutrition and biobased materials. Its Advanced Materials segment produces films and foams for medical, industrial and consumer applications, along with other high-performance materials such as nanomaterials, composites and functional polymers. The company’s Coatings segment provides durable finishes for automotive and aerospace applications, as well as paints and coatings for commercial and residential buildings. Industrial biosciences produce enzymes, probiotics, bio-based building blocks and biobased plastics. Performance Chemicals include catalysts, catalysts intermediates, solvents and surfactants. Safety and Protection offers fire extinguishers, personal protective equipment and other safety products. Water Purification provides systems and services for aquaculture, municipal and industrial water treatment. In addition to these businesses, Dupont invests heavily in research and development, with more than 20,000 people dedicated to innovation. It has built a strong portfolio of intellectual property and leads many industries in terms of technology and innovation. Dupont is committed to making significant contributions to sustainability, health and safety, community involvement, and environmental stewardship. Syngenta – Syngenta is a leading global agriculture company that works to improve global food security by enabling millions of farmers to make better use of available resources. Founded in 2000, Syngenta employs over 28,000 people in more than 90 countries and serves customers in over 140 countries. Syngenta has a strong commitment to innovation, with a portfolio of products and services which includes crop protection solutions, crop nutrition solutions, seeds and digital farming solutions. Their innovations help farmers increase yields, reduce losses from pests, protect the environment, and contribute to the success of the world’s food supply. Syngenta also works closely with governments, producers, and NGOs across the globe to enable sustainable intensification of production by creating an enabling environment for its customers. Syngenta invests heavily in research and development – 5% of its sales are directed towards research and development activities. They work with universities, research institutes, and small and medium-sized enterprises to bring innovative solutions to market quickly. In addition, Syngenta supports partnerships that bring together expertise from different parts of the industry, such as the recently announced collaboration with BASF to support more sustainable farming practices. Syngenta strives to be a leader in driving responsible agricultural solutions that benefit people, animals, and the environment. UPL Limited – UPL Limited is a multinational company based in Mumbai, India, that specializes in agrochemicals and specialty chemicals. Founded in 1969, UPL has grown to become a leading provider of products and services to farmers, growers, businesses, and governments around the globe. The company has a presence in 130 countries and employs over 20,000 people. UPL offers a variety of products, including fertilizers, crop protection chemicals, biostimulants, plant growth regulators, adjuvants, seed treatments, and other specialty products. UPL also provides research, development, and technical support for its customers. UPL’s mission is to help empower farmers and growers to increase their productivity and sustainability through innovative solutions, applications, and technologies. UPL strives to improve the lives of those involved in agriculture by providing the best products, services, and technologies on the market. UPL has been widely recognized for its commitment to innovation, customer service, and environmental stewardship. UPL works closely with universities and research centers around the world to develop new products and technologies that can help increase agricultural productivity. UPL is committed to creating and maintaining a safe and healthy workplace while doing its part to reduce global climate change. Monsanto – Monsanto Company is a multinational agrochemical and agricultural biotechnology corporation based in St. Louis, Missouri. Founded in 1901, it is one of the world’s leading producers of herbicides, insecticides, and genetically modified crops. Monsanto has become a dominant force in global agriculture and food production, controlling or influencing nearly a third of the world’s seed supply. It also produces chemical products used in industrial and consumer applications such as plastics and pharmaceuticals. Monsanto has been the target of numerous controversies related to its production of genetically modified organisms (GMOs), its use of potentially harmful chemical products, and its alleged manipulation of scientific studies to promote its own interests. In 2018, the company was acquired by German chemical and pharmaceutical company Bayer AG. Monsanto is known for developing herbicides, including glyphosate-based Roundup, which remains one of its best-selling products. It has developed numerous GMO crops designed to resist diseases, insects, and herbicides, including soybean, corn, cotton, and canola. Monsanto has also produced food additives such as high-fructose corn syrup and trans fats. The company is one of the largest patent holders in the world, with more than 1,000 patents related to biotechnology. In addition to its controversial production of GMOs, Monsanto has been criticized for its marketing techniques and suspected manipulation of scientific research. It has also been accused of causing significant environmental damage due to its use of chemical products and of using unethical tactics to protect its intellectual property rights. Finally, Monsanto has faced numerous lawsuits related to the health risks associated with its products, including glyphosate-based Roundup. Despite these controversies, Monsanto remains a major player in global agriculture, and its products are used in many countries around the world. BASF India – BASF India is a leading chemical company in the country. It is part of the German multinational BASF Group and is headquartered in Mumbai, Maharashtra. The company is engaged in the production of specialty chemicals, polyurethanes, polymer dispersions, surface treatments, enzymes, performance products, and agricultural solutions. Its core business segments are Chemicals and Performance Products. BASF India has 10 manufacturing sites, three R&D centers, and sales offices throughout India. The company was established in 1993 and since then, it has been providing quality products to its customers. BASF India is committed to sustainability and works towards minimizing its environmental footprint through efficient use of resources, water conservation, and renewable energy initiatives. The company’s products are used in various industries such as automotive, construction, coatings, textile, leather, and paper. BASF India has various initiatives which focus on creating a sustainable future for India. These include initiatives such as Project Rhino, an initiative for the conservation of wildlife, and Project GreenStep, an initiative for reducing energy consumption, waste generation, and water scarcity. Additionally, BASF India also supports other social causes like education and skill development. BASF India is committed to providing innovative solutions to the Indian industry and is constantly focusing on research and development for new products and processes. The company also works with universities, startups, and institutes for innovation and knowledge exchange. BASF India also partners with national and international organizations to support the local community. Overall, BASF India is one of the most trusted companies in India and is committed to providing quality products and services while being socially responsible. Nufarm India – Nufarm India is a leading agrochemical and crop protection company based in India. It is part of the Nufarm Group, an Australian-based global supplier of crop protection and plant nutrition products. Nufarm India was established in 2001 and has since grown to become one of the largest agrochemical companies in the country. The company offers a wide range of products and services that include herbicides, fungicides, insecticides, rodenticides, soil conditioners, and seed treatment products. They also provide technical advice to farmers and other agrochemical users. Nufarm India focuses on improving crop yields by providing quality products and services to help farmers increase their productivity. Their products are designed to be safe, effective, and cost-effective. The company also provides training and seminars to educate customers on proper usage of their products. Nufarm India is committed to developing new technologies that can help solve many of the challenges facing the agricultural sector in India. They have invested heavily in research and development to develop innovative solutions that have the potential to revolutionize farming practices in the region. Nufarm India also seeks to promote sustainable agriculture by promoting better practices for farmers. By doing so, it contributes to the overall productivity of the farming community. Advanta India – Advanta India is a leading agri-biotech company focused on developing innovative crop solutions for Indian farmers. Founded in 2004, Advanta has developed a wide range of proprietary technologies and products that have been successfully deployed across the country. The company’s innovative approaches are helping to increase farmer incomes and improve access to nutritious food. Advanta’s products are designed to help farmers make their crops more productive and efficient, as well as reduce the risks and costs associated with farming. Advanta is also contributing to the development of the ‘Green Revolution’ by introducing improved inputs, such as herbicides, insecticides, fungicides, etc. and advanced seed varieties, which can grow faster and yield higher-quality produce. The company has set up R&D centres across India and established collaborations with many international companies, universities and government organizations to develop and distribute its products. Advanta produces a diverse range of high-quality seeds for different crop species, both for traditional and modern agricultural purposes. They have also introduced several biotechnologies, such as tissue culturing, hybridization, biofortification and nanotechnology, among others. Advanta has also invested heavily in research and development in order to find solutions to address some of the most pressing issues faced by Indian agriculture. These include finding ways to counter soil infertility and drought, improving crop productivity, and developing new seed varieties with resistance to diseases. Advanta has also created numerous farmer support initiatives, such as providing training and extension services. In addition, the company runs a number of social enterprise programs aimed at supporting rural communities and smallholder farmers. Overall, Advanta India is dedicated to providing solutions to the challenges faced by Indian farmers while also investing in innovation and technology to advance its mission further. Its goal is to become the leading provider of sustainable and affordable agricultural solutions in India. PI Industries – Pi Industries is a leading Indian agrochemical company that produces a wide range of products, such as insecticides, herbicides, fungicides, and plant growth regulators. The company was founded in 1947, with its headquarters located in Gurgaon, India. It has a presence in more than 30 countries, including the US, China, Africa, and Southeast Asia. Its product portfolio includes over 500 active molecules and formulations. Pi Industries has an established network of 40 manufacturing units in India and abroad, supported by a team of experienced professionals and highly trained personnel. The company places great emphasis on research and development, which has enabled it to introduce path-breaking solutions for crop protection. It works closely with organizations in the public and private sectors to develop customized solutions for agricultural practices. Through its integrated pest management solutions, Pi Industries helps farmers maximize their productivity while minimizing costs. The company also provides technical support to farmers across the country, helping them make informed decisions regarding best agricultural practices. Sumitomo Chemical India. – Sumitomo Chemical India is a leading chemical company in India. It has been operational since 1991 and is a subsidiary of Sumitomo Chemical Co. Ltd., Japan. The company is engaged in the manufacture and sales of various chemicals, including agrochemicals, fertilizers, electronics materials, and functional polymers. In terms of agrochemicals, the company provides insecticides, fungicides, herbicides and plant growth regulators. In terms of electronics materials, it manufactures semiconductor-related products, such as integrated circuits, liquid crystal displays and LED components. Additionally, Sumitomo Chemical India produces industrial materials, such as thermoplastic polyurethanes, silicones, synthetic rubbers, and speciality resins. The company has three manufacturing plants located across India, including one in Gujarat, one in Maharashtra and one in Tamil Nadu. It also has a research and development centre based in Hyderabad. The company works closely with governmental agencies and other organizations to ensure the safety and environmental sustainability of its products. To this end, it has obtained certifications for ISO 9001:2015 and ISO 14001:2015. Sumitomo Chemical India is committed to providing high-quality products and services to its customers through its technical support and customer service departments. It also actively participates in various government-sponsored programs to promote its products. The company’s vision is to become the leader of the chemical industry in India. Its mission is to create an environment where all stakeholders can contribute to the sustainable development of society and the environment. CONCLUSION In India, agricultural chemical companies have seen a significant increase in their profits in 2023. Companies are utilizing new technologies to develop more efficient and cost-effective products. The demand for organic products is also increasing among consumers, leading to the growth of organizations focused on organic farming. Additionally, government initiatives such as subsidies and tax benefits are making it easier for farmers to access agricultural chemicals. As a result, the Indian agricultural sector is predicted to experience further advancements and growth in the near future.
